name: Billy Meets World
storyline: In Billy Meets World, similar to the recent cult-favorite Flappy Bird, players will help Billy navigate the world of Lauv’s “Drugs & The Internet” music video. As Lauv continues to release songs from his rolling album, new themed levels will be added to the game.
summary: In Billy Meets World, similar to the recent cult-favorite Flappy Bird, players will help Billy navigate the world of Lauv’s “Drugs & The Internet” music video.
